snippet: As the European competition chief appears near the end of settlement talks with Google over its search business, he must decide whether to take up a new complaint about its mobile business.
abstract: European competition commissioner Joaquin Almunia is deciding whether to take up antitrust complaint accusing Google of using Android mobile operating system to promoting its own products and services.
lead_paragraph: As the European competition chief appears near the end of settlement talks with Google over its search business, he must decide whether to take up a new complaint about its mobile business.

headline.main: World’s Tech Companies Look to Brussels to Resolve Antitrust Complaints
headline.print_headline: World’s Tech Companies Look to Brussels to Resolve Antitrust Complaints
